item.title: Syntopical
item.description: Syntopical: Referring to a type of analysis in which different works are compared and contrasted. Flashcards Definition position ease box interval due back 2.50 8 278.81 2023-11-23T10:25:09Z front 2.80 8 338.35 2024-02-01T23:23:30Z Syntopical Back Referring to a type of analysis in which different works are compared and contrasted. Extra After finishing his syntopical reading of the leaders' speeches, he wrote an essay comparing the language used by Reagan, Carter, Gorbachev, and Qaddafi.
